otp.group6.audioeditor

Class AudioCloudDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.audioeditor.AudioCloudDAO

  • public class AudioCloudDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    AudioCloudDAO is a class that handles the database connection, user object and mixer settings object. Main functionality is to read from the database and write into the database. Database holds user information including name, encrypted password and encrypted salt for the password. Also stored are mixer settings that can be used in the main applications mixer.
    Author:
    Joonas Soininen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AudioCloudDAO.MixerSetting
      MixerSettings class is used as an object to access the database mixer settings data in the main application.
      static class  AudioCloudDAO.User
      Class Users is used as a object for the user while logged in.

      • chekcforUser

        public boolean chekcforUser(java.lang.String user)
        Method to check for user name availability from the database.
        Parameters:
        user - is the inputed user name from the user
        Returns:
        statement return true if the user name exist and false if it is available

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser(java.lang.String user,
                          java.lang.String pw)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method is used to deliver a new user name in to the database.
        Parameters:
        user, - new user name to be inputed into the database
        pw, - hashed password
        Returns:
        true if the new user was inputed in to the database, false if it was not successful
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a problem with the database

      • loginUser

        public java.lang.String loginUser(java.lang.String u,
                                  java.lang.String p)
        Method logs in user if the credentials are correct and the user is found in the database.
        Parameters:
        u, - inputted user name
        p, - inputted password
        Returns:
        Welcome "user" if user name and password were correct, No user if the user name does not exist, Incorrect user or pw if either is not correct, Unexpected error logging in, please try again! if there is any sort of problem with the SQL database.

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword(java.lang.String u,
                              java.lang.String p,
                              java.lang.String np)
        Method to change users password
        Parameters:
        u, - user name given by the user
        p, - old password of the user
        np, - new password that user wants to be set
        Returns:
        true if password was changed correctly, false if old password is not a match, if there is a problem with the database connection, if the user name does not match.

      • loggedIn

        public java.lang.String loggedIn()
        Method checks the user-class for logged in user.
        Returns:
        empty string if the user has not been set and returns user name if it is set

      • logoutUser

        public boolean logoutUser()
        Method to logout the user
        Returns:
        true when logged out, false when not

      • createMix

        public boolean createMix(java.lang.String mixName,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         double pitch,
                         double echo,
                         double decay,
                         double gain,
                         double flangerLenght,
                         double wetness,
                         double lfoFrequency,
                         float lowPass)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to add mixer setting to the database with given parameters
        Parameters:
        mixName, - compulsory has to have one
        description, - voluntary input
        pitch, - double value preset
        echo, - double value preset
        decay, - double value preset
        gain, - double value preset
        flangerLenght, - double value preset
        wetness, - double value preset
        lfoFrequency, - double value preset
        lowPass, - float value preset
        Returns:
        true when mixer setting was successfully inserted to the database, false if there is anything wrong.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String[] getUsers()
        Method to get all users listed from the database. This method is only used for development.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of all the users listed in the database

      • getAllMixArray

      • getCertainMixesArray

        public AudioCloudDAO.MixerSetting[] getCertainMixesArray(int select,
                                                         java.lang.String specify)
        Method is used to get specific mixer setting from a user, including a certain name or something in it's description.
        Parameters:
        select - is a variable used to specify what are being searched.
        specify - is a variable that is searched for.
        Returns:
        returns the search in an array list containing mixer settings objects.

      • deleteMix

        public boolean deleteMix(java.lang.String name,
                         int id)
        Method is used to delete mixer settings from the database using the creators name and the settings id.
        Parameters:
        name, - creators name
        id, - mixer settings id
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful, false if there was anything wrong.
